idea-plugin.name: Php Inspections (EA Extended)
idea-plugin.description:
Extended PHP code inspections set.

Detecting:
- possible code constructs simplifications
- weak types control (important in Enterprise Applications)
- micro-optimization cases (eg un-necessary double quotes)
- not optimal and duplicate if conditions

Some of inspections are expecting conditional statements (eg. if) to use group statement for wrapping body expressions. When this requirement is met then additional inspections are applied to source code.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
5 Jan 2015: improvements and new inspections:

- re-worked inspections classification and descriptions

- 'empty(...)' usage: added new suggestions for refactoring
- 'isset(...)' usage: added new suggestions for refactoring
- missing or empty conditionals group statement: added empty group statement detection
- not optimal if conditions inspection: reduced amount of false positives

- callable parameter usage violates definition inspection added
- foreach source to iterate over inspection added
- types casting via PHP4 functions inspection added
- 'count(...)' calls on Propel collection inspection added

21 Dec 2014: bug-fixes, improvements and new inspections:
- improved not optimal if conditions inspection (duplicate conditions, booleans checks)
- added ambiguous null field initialization inspection
- added loop which does not loop inspection
